title: A third of eateries' income comes from delivery apps: JM Financial report
description: Over 85% of the restaurants have higher price tags on their online menu, compared with dine-in menu prices to recoup high aggregator commissions and discounts, said a recent report by JM Financial that surveyed more than 135 restaurants spread across top 10 cities.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
